resources.string: Norsk Quiz will help you test the Norwegian grammar concepts you have learned. \nPlaying the Quiz several times help you remember and improve your vocabulary.

Select the answer from the options given. You can choose to continue with Next button or quit using the Quit button at any stage of the quiz. 

You can check your score at the end of the quiz. You are considered Pass, if you score over 70%. 

You can return to the title screen using up or back from within the quiz screen, and this will also end your quiz.
